price: Oysa gökte burçlar yaratan ve orada aydınlatıcı olarak güneşi ve ayı var eden Allah ne yücedir.
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجٗا وَقَمَرٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī jaʿala fī al-samāi burūjan wajaʿala fīhā sirājan waqamaran munīran
